mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SEED (SEED_INDEX, MAMBER_MAIL, SEED, SEED_DATE, SEED_STATE) VALUES(NULL,#{member_mail},#{seed},SYSDATE(), #{seed_state})
mapper.select: select (select nvl(sum(seed),0) from seed where MAMBER_MAIL = #{member_mail} and SEED_STATE IN ('B','I') ) - (select nvl(sum(seed),0) from seed where MAMBER_MAIL = #{member_mail} and SEED_STATE = 'D')
select SEED,SEED_INDEX ,SEED_DATE,SEED_STATE from SEED where MAMBER_MAIL = #{member_mail} order by SEED_INDEX desc limit 5
